name: German Flight
description:
We have lift off! Can't decide which is your favorite? We have you covered. Try our 4 most popular beers: 
1. Schofferhofer Hefeweizen Grapefruit Bier
2. Paulaner Muenchner Lager
3. Paulaner Oktoberfest
4. Warsteiner Dunkel Lager

name: Local Craft Beer Flight
description:
Looking for something besides German beer? We have you covered with a local craft flight. Now you can order four of our local favorites!
1. LAB Light Cider
2. Other Half Forever Ever
3. First State Excited Beeps
4. Burley Oak Sorry Chickie
Enjoy! No substitutions.
